post:
Hello all,

We still have some instances available now at discounted price. Please see our website. All offers come with Anti-DDoS and Anti-DDoS game from OVH which you can control using our own in-house written IP management control panel, please see our website for more info on that:

https://autovm.com/?page_id=3156

You can edit reverse DNS, create port and game rules and enable or disable permanent mitigation and set alerts so you will get notified by e-mail in the event of an attack.

11306×322 21.7 KB

We have Windows ISOs available (bring your own license) for self-installation as well as most common Linux templates for immediate activation. All plans are instantly activated upon purchase as well.

We have the following KVM VPS still in stock in Franfkurt, Germany:

  • 1x E3-1270v6@3.80GHz vCPU
  • 2 GB ECC RAM
  • 20 GB NVMe SSD Disk
  • 1 GBps uplink
  • Unmetered traffic (fair use)
  • OVH Anti-DDoS Pro
  • DDoS Pro Control Panel
  • 1 IPv4 Address (1 additional possible)
  • /80 IPv6 Subnet
  • Frankfurt location.
  • 7 days not happy money back guarantee

Use code LETSPECIAL for €1,- month lifetime discount.
Prices starting at €4 with discount included.

Direct order link: https://autovm.com/billing/cart.php?a=confproduct&i=3

We also have Game VDS instances still in stock, these come with guaranteed resources for locations Frankfurt, London and Singapore.

  • 1 vCPU Core i7-6700/7700K@4.0GHz
  • 2 GB RAM
  • 20 GB NVMe SSD Disk
  • 1 GBps uplink
  • Up to 20 TB Bandwidth
  • Anti-DDoS Game & Anti-DDoS Pro
  • (Game) Anti-DDoS Control Panel
  • 1 IPv4 Address (If you need more please open ticket)
  • /80 IPv6 Subnet
  • London, Frankfurt, Singapore
  • 7 days not happy money back guarantee

Use code 20OFF for 20% off lifetime discount
Prices starting at € 12,- with discount.

Direct order link: https://autovm.com/billing/cart.php?gid=8

We accept Paypal, Credit Card, Bitcoin, iDEAL, Bancontact, Sofort and Giropay. For other payment options please contact us at sales@autovm.com
